info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 12:17AM EDT until July 25 at 12:30AM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 1230 AM EDT FOR SOUTHERN GEAUGA COUNTY... At 1216 AM EDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from near Middlefield to near South Russell, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... South Russell, Middlefield, Burton, Parkman, Chagrin Falls, Huntsburg, Claridon and Bainbridge. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...<.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
